bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shi yin 失音① , loss of voice. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xing 杏 quotes Yao zhun 藥准 : 卒失音聲：方同上 , “For sudden loss of voice : the same recipe as listed above”. Cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death [46]

Alternative Names bao si 暴死 , bao wang 暴亡 , bao yao 暴夭 . Serious Pathological Condition with sudden loss of consciousness, and an appearance of being dead. Prognosis includes a possibility of revitalization, and of death. Ling shu 靈樞 49: 人不病卒 死，何以知之 , “If someone has not been ill and yet develops a sudden [appearance of] death , how can this be understood?”
